abstract: The Treasury Department has sold more than half its stake in Citigroup, which it acquired as part of the bank’s $45 billion bailout, and it expects the government to make a good profit from its investment.
snippet: The Treasury Department has sold more than half its stake in Citigroup, which it acquired as part of the bank’s $45 billion bailout, and it expects the government to make a good profit from its investment.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department is well on its way to bidding a fond farewell to Citigroup.

headline.main: Treasury Reaps Billions as It Sells Its Citi Shares
